channel.title: A couple questions :)
channel.description:
hey i have a couple questions
ok first when i want to add a shop like Lumbrige genral store
Autospawn: spawn = 520 3212 3246 0 3214 3250 3208 3242 1 Lumbridge General Store Shop Keeper
spawn = 521 3212 3246 0 3214 3250 3208 3242 1 Lumbridge General Store Shop Assistant
Shops: shop = 22 Lumbridge_General_Store 1 1 1931 5 1935 2 1735 2 1925 3 1923 2 1887 2 590 2 1755 2 2347 5 550 5
they wont trade or when i talk to them it wont open the window
and another question
i want to delete the ::home command and i want to make people start in lumbrige? any advice on that?

item.title: A couple questions :)
item.dc:creator: @Dreaded_Such Dreaded Such
item.description:
@Dreaded_Such wrote:

what do i search for in client.java to make it read the shop?

Read full topic

item.title: A couple questions :)
item.dc:creator: @Eddie12390 Eddie12390
item.description:
@Eddie12390 wrote:

You have to make it into a shop in client.java so that the server knows to open that window and for the second, just use a coords code or however you can find out the coordinates, search for the X coords in client.java, and edit the codes that have the exact coords as the one you found to coords of the place you want to set as home.

Read full topic

item.title: A couple questions :)
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

You have to edit the first or second click npc packets to open the shop menu for that npc type.

Read full topic
